org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.support
[Java] Class ClosureEventListener

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.support.ClosureEventListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hibernate.event.SaveOrUpdateEventListener, org.hibernate.event.PreLoadEventListener, org.hibernate.event.PostLoadEventListener, org.hibernate.event.PostInsertEventListener, org.hibernate.event.PostUpdateEventListener, org.hibernate.event.PostDeleteEventListener, org.hibernate.event.PreDeleteEventListener, org.hibernate.event.PreUpdateEventListener
@SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked", "serial"})
public class ClosureEventListener
extends java.lang.Object

Invokes closure events on domain entities such as beforeInsert, beforeUpdate and beforeDelete.

Also deals with auto time stamping of domain classes that have properties named 'lastUpdated' and/or 'dateCreated'.

Authors:
Lari Hotari
Since:
1.3.5
